name: Old New Orleans Church Laser scan to Revit Interactive for Oculus Rift S
name_original: Old New Orleans Church Laser scan to Revit Interactive for Oculus Rift S
description:
The left hand thumb trigger and index trigger will turn the laser scan off and on.

The right hand thumb trigger and index trigger will turn the model off and on

The "B" button on the right hand Oculus controller will turn on lights and open doors.

Make sure the volume is turned up!
